channel.title: U torrent help
channel.description:
Hello i have changed the port on utorrent to the server port. i can login for a short while and then the server close...
u know why?
here is what i do:
start No-Ip start u-torrent close u-torrent start server run u-torrent
i do anything bad?
please help me
-Meele

item.title: U torrent help
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:4, topic:284831”][quote author=bobbie1990 link=topic=376436.msg2836174#msg2836174 date=1245677187]

Umm, How you mean with server close?

the server goes offline… after a short while
[/quote]Does it got offline when you playnig or when you leave comp on or what?[/quote]

when i just play on the server… after maybe 2 mins…
but it work fine with hamachi but then not like much people play on it becouse they dont want to connect with hamachi and stuff…

Read full topic

item.title: U torrent help
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

Hello i have changed the port on utorrent to the server port. i can login for a short while and then the server close…

u know why?

here is what i do:

start No-Ip
start u-torrent
close u-torrent
start server
run u-torrent

i do anything bad?

please help me

-Meele

Read full topic
